attributes.action: award Jeff Stelling as a knight of the realm for his services to television and sport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the petition feel that it is about time that a true cult hero and living legend in the world of football should be rewarding for his sterling service to the nation.  With his thorough knowledge and dedication to the game Saturday afternoons wouldn't be the same without Sir Jeff Stelling.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
